verses.text:
The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w shewed|strong="H7200"\w* me, and, behold, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w baskets|strong="H1736"\w* of \w figs|strong="H8384"\w* \add were\add* \w set|strong="H3259"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w after|strong="H0310"\w* that \w Nebuchadrezzar|strong="H5019"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* had carried away \w captive|strong="H1540"\w* \w Jeconiah|strong="H3204"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoiakim|strong="H3079"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, with the \w carpenters|strong="H2796"\w* and \w smiths|strong="H4525"\w*, from \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and had \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* them to \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*.

\w One|strong="H0259"\w* \w basket|strong="H1731"\w* \add had\add* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w figs|strong="H8384"\w*, \add even\add* like the \w figs|strong="H8384"\w* \add that are\add* first \w ripe|strong="H1073"\w*: and the \w other|strong="H0259"\w* \w basket|strong="H1731"\w* \add had\add* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w naughty|strong="H7451"\w* \w figs|strong="H8384"\w*, which could not be \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w*, they were so \w bad|strong="H7455"\w*.\f + \fr 24.2 \ft they…: Heb. for badness\f*

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* unto me, What \w seest|strong="H7200"\w* thou, \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*? And I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Figs|strong="H8384"\w*; the \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w figs|strong="H8384"\w*, \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*; and the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, that cannot be \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w*, they are so \w evil|strong="H7455"\w*.
¶ Again the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; Like these \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w figs|strong="H8384"\w*, so will I \w acknowledge|strong="H5234"\w* them that are carried away \w captive|strong="H1546"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, whom I have \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* out of this \w place|strong="H4725"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w* for \add their\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*.\f + \fr 24.5 \ft them…: Heb. the captivity\f*

For I will \w set|strong="H7760"\w* mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* upon them for \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, and I will bring them \w again|strong="H7725"\w* to this \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: and I will \w build|strong="H1129"\w* them, and not pull \add them\add* \w down|strong="H2040"\w*; and I will \w plant|strong="H5193"\w* them, and not pluck \add them\add* \w up|strong="H5428"\w*.

And I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* them an \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* to \w know|strong="H3045"\w* me, that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and they shall be my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and I will be their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: for they shall \w return|strong="H7725"\w* unto me with their whole \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.

¶ And as the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w figs|strong="H8384"\w*, which cannot be \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w*, they are so \w evil|strong="H7455"\w*; surely thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, So will I \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and his \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, and the \w residue|strong="H7611"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, that \w remain|strong="H7604"\w* in this \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and them that \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*:

And I will \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* them to be \w removed|strong="H2189"\w* into all the \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* for \add their\add* \w hurt|strong="H7451"\w*, \add to be\add* a \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* and a \w proverb|strong="H4912"\w*, a \w taunt|strong="H8148"\w* and a \w curse|strong="H7045"\w*, in all \w places|strong="H4725"\w* whither I shall \w drive|strong="H5080"\w* them.\f + \fr 24.9 \ft to be removed: Heb. for removing, or, vexation\f*

And I will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, the \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*, and the \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w*, among them, till they be \w consumed|strong="H8552"\w* from off the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* that I \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* unto them and to their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.
